product_description: This elegant necklace in sterling silver or gold plate is embellished with baubles and a dainty charm of Our Lady of Guadalupe.
product_details_and_care:
This elegant necklace in sterling silver or gold plate is embellished with baubles and a dainty charm of Our Lady of Guadalupe.
13 1/4" length; 3 1/4" extender; 3/8" pendant diameter
Lobster clasp closure
Sterling silver or sterling silver with 18k-gold plate
